This text file explains how to use SINS2.sh script to run a simulation on SINS.
Open the SINS2.sh script, and modify it according to your needs.


-projectName: under this argument you need to specify the name of the scenario to simulate
-numberOfSimulation: specify how many replicates do you want to simulate for a scenario
-parallel: "yes" if you want to simulate differnt replicates of teh same scenario in parallel, otherwise "no".
-outputFormat: leave it as "adegenet"
-outputFile: specify in which folder the output of the simulated scenario will be saved.
-verbose: if "true", a line for each replicate will appear on the screen during the simulation
